subject: When running a test suite a private static final field Object is null. Why?
msgSnippet: Hi, I am running an instrumentation test suite with a field like this: private final static Object LOCK = new Object(); And at one point in the test, the LOCK
messageBody:
Hi,

I am running an instrumentation test suite with a field like this:

private final static Object LOCK = new Object();

And at one point in the test, the LOCK variable becomes null. How is that even possible?

Thanks!
